title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 247.7 - Permanent label
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 247.7 - Permanent label

State Regulations
(a) A permanent
label shall be affixed to all new outdoor wood boilers by the manufacturer. (1)

The label shall be made of a material
that is sufficiently durable to last the lifetime of the new outdoor wood
boiler. (2)

The label shall be
affixed to the new outdoor wood boiler in a readily visible or accessible
location. (3)

The label shall be
affixed in such a manner that it cannot be removed from the new outdoor wood
boiler without causing damage to the label. (4)

The following information shall be
displayed on the label: (i) name and address
of the manufacturer; (ii)
date of
manufacture; (iii)
model name and
number; (iv)
serial
number; (v) thermal output rating
in Btu/h; and
(vi)
certified
particulate emission rate in pounds per million British thermal units heat
output. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
247.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
